item.title: The Psi Encyclopedia
item.description: Introduction The Psi Encyclopedia is a collection of articles and case studies about psi research, the scientific investigation of psychic phenomena. It’s a work in progress, being created by the Society for Psychical Research in London. Link You can access the site here: https://psi-encyclopedia.spr.ac.uk
